ygData.subject: quick question
ygData.msgSnippet: I used to play EQ a lot and still signed up to the tinkering newsletter, but my account hasnt been active in a while, i think i re-signed over last
ygData.messageBody:
I used to play EQ a lot and still signed up to the
tinkering newsletter, but my account hasnt been
'active' in a while, i think i re-signed over last
thanksgiving (november 2001) just to log in and
remember the days. I have a 45 necro and was
wondering how long my account can be inactive until
they delete my character (which i dont want to
happen.) I thought i read somewhere it was 3 months,
but I know that when i re-activated my account back in
november i hadnt played in like 4-5 months and it was
still there... anyone know the real answer to this, i
would really appreciate it :p

thanks
